item.title: Healthy living with 'No Oil' Recipes - Non Vegetarian
STOP HEART ATTACKS AND STROKES IN WOMEN.
item.description: Notice: Please do NOT enrol on this course on impulse, thinking you might watch it later. Maybe show an interest on impulse, yes, but before you enrol, watch the Preview videos, read the Course Description and then make a decision. If you then enrol then please start the course as soon as possible. Watch the lectures, look at the workbooks and join in the discussions. Joining my courses is a serious business and I want you to get the most out of your study – but I also want you to enjoy the course.

item.title: Medical Device Regulations
item.description: The medical device industry is growing rapidly, providing great opportunities for innovators, experts and entrepreneurs. This course will provide a detailed overview of the way in which new devices go from concept to product, providing you with a starting point to develop a deep understanding of this complex and fast-moving business space. We will cover all of the key components of bringing a new device to market, including: Paths to Market, including the 510K, PMA, HDE and other commonly used pathways

item.title: Hypnosis for help to Relieve heal Psoriasis Hypnosis Program
item.description: 5 Star Review He does a good job with hypnosis, I had a good experience and I appreciate the bonuses he adds. I would definitely recommend any course Alan Kirwin produces. Darlene Wolf Hypnosis for help to Relieve heal Psoriasis Hypnosis Program has been created to simulate a private therapy session with me Learn how to relieve Psoriasis that for many can have symptoms triggered by everyday highs and lows hypnosis will help to give you relief from those symptoms by giving you a more relaxed attitude to all of what used to upset you and cause your psoriasis symptoms to flare up.

item.title: Media Training for Doctors/Healthcare Pros: Master the Media
item.description: Media Training. Imagine that every time you speak to a healthcare reporter, you get the exact message and even the exact quotes you wanted in the final story. Wouldn't it be great if your medical expertise got into the final story without any distortions? In this Media Training for Doctors and Healthcare Professionals course, you will learn the following: * How to look your best on camera * How to shape a media message * How to answer health reporters' questions * How to speak in sound bites * How to get the exact quote you want in the final story This media training course is delivered primarily through spoken lectures.

item.title: Entrepreneurship: Healthy Lifestyle - The Untold Story
item.description: Updated: January 2022 Weight Loss – Big Secret You’ve heard a lot of bad publicity about weight loss and fitness. But here’s something you may not have known. ________________________________________________________________________ Why is this weight loss program different from others and Why should I believe it will work? I must admit that there are 1000’s of weight loss programs and ideas on how to shed those unwanted fatty parts of the body.

item.title: Health and Nutrition Basics
item.description: Health and Nutrition Basics is about giving you a basic understanding of what food can do for your body. This course was designed using my experiences with health and fitness in mind. Using what you are going to learn in this course, I have successfully lost over 40 pounds of fat from my body in just over a year, and kept it off. This information will help you because it's the same information that helped me and that I continue to implement daily.

item.title: Complete Good Sleep Habits Course - Sleep Better Tonight!
item.description: Complete Good Sleep Habits Course - Sleep Better Tonight! Build Healthy Sleep Habits - Eliminate Insomnia - Learn Strong Habits to Sleep Better - Become Well Rested Again You can increase your odds of getting a good night's sleep. Most people who are poor sleepers have poor sleep habits. Personal development and habit expert TJ Walker will teach you how to build strong sleep habits effortlessly. In this course, TJ Walker will cover every important habit you need to develop in order to have a solid and restful night's sleep.

item.title: 2022 Test of Essential Academic Skills TEAS
item.description: Welcome ! Test of Essential Academic Skills TEAS Salary Potential: $72,000 per year 97% Pass in First Attempt Easily What does TEAS stand for? TEAS stands for Test of Essential Academic Skills. It is a standardized admissions test used by many nursing schools to evaluate potential candidates for possible acceptance into their program. The TEAS exam assesses knowledge and skills in reading, math, science and English language use. A Free Professional quiz that is designed to help you with your TEAS test prep.

item.title: Eczema Solution - Discover The Secrets Of Beating Eczema
item.description: “Eczema Solution” is your ultimate guide on everything you need to know about handling & controlling this skin condition. While eczema is not a disease — and there is no immediate cure for it … You can get rid of the unbearable itch and inflammation of the skin with the strategies revealed in this training.Whether you are diagnosed with eczema or if you are living with a person who suffers from this skin condition … This is the training that you’ve been looking for!

item.title: Healthy Heart - Strengthen, Heal & Protect Your Heart
item.description: In This Online Healthy Heart Course You Will Learn How To Handle A Heart Attack, Should It Occur. You Will Also Learn Specific Strategies To Make Your Heart Healthier And Help Prevent Heart Attacks. This Self-Help Course Covers ALL The Major Skills You Need To Strengthen Your Heart .,. And Live A Full And Productive Life. Also Great For Family Members & Loved Ones Who Want To Learn More In This Area.

item.title: Simple & Easy Ways To Cure Insomnia: Sleep Better! (Deep)
item.description: In This Online Insomnia Solutions Course You Will Learn How Can Transform Your Life By Beating Insomnia! This Self-Help Course Covers All The Major Skills You Need To Beat Insomnia ... And Get Your Life Back! Insomnia Is Horrible … And Nobody Should Have To Live With It. Unfortunately … We Were Never Taught How To Beat Insomnia. Now You Will Have Those Skills With This One Simple Course! You deserve better sleep - deep sleep.

item.title: Sleep hacking: Parapsychology tips for Sleep Better
item.description: Sleep is one of the most important stages of daily life. Sleep will help you regain energy and get things done. Having a good night's sleep will give you peace of mind and creativity in your mind throughout the day. As a result, you can perform better in life. If you can't sleep well at night and stay up until the morning, don't worry because you are not alone. In this course, I will teach you how to solve all your sleep problems with scientific and logical methods that have been tested for years, so that you can sleep more easily.

item.title: 2022 Registered Medical Assistant RMA Practice Tests
item.description: Registered Medical Assistant RMA Practice Tests 97% Pass in First Attempt Easily Preparing for your RMA (Registered Medical Assistant) exam by taking practice tests has many benefits. Using sample questions to study for your test is the most effective study practice you can use. The advantages of using RMA sample tests include: Increasing Your Speed – The RMA exam has a three hour time limit. Although most students who take the RMA feel that there is sufficient time, taking the practice tests with self-imposed timers help you budget your time effectively.

item.title: Body&Mind Health Masterclass: A Complete Guide to BodyDetox
item.description: This online detoxification course will teach you how to detox efficiently and professionally and even lose weight, whatever your age, weight or sex. This detox course is designed to teach you the ins and outs of detoxification, even if you have little to no experience with it and to restart your system so that you stand out from the crowd. Master Detox Techniques to reset your system! While there are plenty of detox courses that focus on specific diets or how to lose weight, it's hard to find a comprehensive course like this one, which is for beginner to advanced detoxers.

item.title: Herbalism: Herbalism Certification Diploma Course
item.description: This is the place to start if you have ever dreamed of working in the field of Natural-Complementary Medicine and Herbalism. We have created this course to bring our combined years of experience in the field to you in the comfort of your own home. This course is filled with educational and career insights and opportunities, with each one more exciting than the next. There are so many ways to create a career in Natural and Complementary Medicine and whether your passion is Medicinal Plants, Homeopathy or People, the practice of Natural and Complementary Medicine is the vital bridge between all of them.

item.title: Your Guide To Health
item.description: Do you ache all day every day? Do you find that your energy levels are always on empty? Do you suffer from pain all over or in specific places? Are you tired of hearing: "It's all in your head"? Then this course will change your life. Martin Pytela, Life Enthusiast Health Coach, and Co-instructor, Scott Paton, share the foundational causes of your chronic illnesses, the impact they have on your body and finally proven steps to deal with your health challenges.

item.title: Secrets Of Reverse Aging & Longevity
item.description: This Online Course On “Reverse Aging” You Will Show You How To Transform Your Body, Mind & Turn Back The Clock! This Anti-Aging Course Covers ALL The Major Strategies You Need To Turn Back The Biological Clock & Be Younger. Try These Techniques … And Feel Amazing! These Techniques & Strategies ALSO Reduce Your Chance Of Getting MOST Ailments! WOW!!! You Can’t Beat That! Get Your Energy, Youth & Vitality Back!

item.title: Biohacking Secrets: Boost Your Physical & Mental Health
item.description: Biohacking ... The Science Of Improving YOU! How Cool Is That! What a Major Life-Advantage! BioHacking Can Help You Perform Better & Live Longer ... What Could Be Better Than That? The Funny Thing is How EASY It Is To Do ... You Just Have To Know The Secrets. Jump Into This Course ... We Will Hold Nothing Back! Want To Feel Better & Have More Energy? Want To Boost Your Focus & Memory?

item.title: 2021 Home Health Aide HHA Practice Tests
item.description: Welcome ! 2021 Home Health Aide HHA Practice Tests Home Health Aide (HHA) certificate programs provide courses on patient care, basic medical care, emergency response and housekeeping duties. Certificate programs usually require one semester of study where students learn how to take care of residents by administering medications, cooking, cleaning, organizing household goods and assisting with personal hygiene. Additionally they learn how to take vital signs like pulse and blood pressure.

item.title: Stop Teeth Grinding Bruxism Program your Mind with Hypnosis
item.description: Stop Teeth Grinding Bruxism Program your Mind with Hypnosis Student Review Having gone through each lesson once and the hypnosis meditation several times I feel I have already learnt some extremely beneficial strategies..... The sessions are short but very easy to follow, Alan is an extremely good presenter and explains everything well. I will continue to listen to the hypnosis session daily for the next 21 days as he suggests and revisit the rest of the course too.

item.title: Pharmacy Assistants In Canada Preparation Course
item.description: ** Last updated on Aug 24 2021 ** **This course will also help US students in the clinical part as there are a lot of similarities** ** Your Certificate Will Be Available As Soon As You Finish The Course ** **We will mostly use Ontario, federal, and students insurances to empower your billing skills** Are you looking for a career as a pharmacy assistant in Canada (especially in Ontario)? Are you a pharmacy assistant and would like to improve your skills and take your career to the next level?
